title: Rigidify styryl-pyridinium dyes to benzo[h]coumarin-based bright two-photon fluorescent probes for cellular bioimaging
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,10255-10261
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08269E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Chengjing Zhang, Zihao Yu, Yang Liu, Wendong Jin, Zhiqiang Liu, Xiaoqiang Yu
A comparison of benzo[h]coumarin-pyridinium and the structurally similar styryl-pyridinium clearly indicated the rigidifying strategy could remarkably tune the fluorescence efficiency and cellular bioimaging behavior.
